name: Ocean Majesty
description: Luxurious 80ft yacht perfect for special occasions and corporate events. Features spacious deck, modern amenities, and professional crew.

name: Sea Breeze
description: Classic 45ft sailboat ideal for peaceful sailing adventures. Experience the joy of wind-powered cruising with stunning ocean views.

name: Paradise Explorer
description: Spacious catamaran with dual hulls for stability. Perfect for snorkeling trips, sunset cruises, and group celebrations.

name: Thunder Wave
description: High-performance speedboat for thrill-seekers. Enjoy water sports, wakeboarding, and fast-paced lake adventures.

name: Sunset Serenity
description: Elegant 65ft motor yacht with panoramic windows and luxury interiors. Perfect for romantic getaways and intimate gatherings.

name: Wind Dancer
description: Beautiful 38ft sailboat offering authentic sailing experience. Explore historic harbors and coastal waterways in style.

name: Aqua Adventure
description: Large catamaran perfect for island hopping and snorkeling tours. Features water slides, snorkel gear, and tropical refreshments.

name: Lightning Bolt
description: Sleek speedboat designed for coastal exploration and water sports. High-speed thrills with comfortable seating and sound system.

name: Coral Dream
description: Luxury yacht with spacious decks and modern amenities. Ideal for family vacations, parties, and corporate charters.
